name: SmartAsTechSupport
0:
”Alexa, ask Tech Support why my computer is broken.”
”Alexa, ask Tech Support what's wrong with my computer.”
”Alexa, open Tech Support.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tech support
des:
Tech Support is supposed to provide you with assistance when your computer is not working. But sometimes, they can be sassy or unhelpful.

Ask Tech Support what's wrong with your computer, and the response will be comical. It's as easy as "Alexa, ask Tech Support why my computer is broken."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
